name: DOGFORCE: SEASONS
description:
It's Time For Walkies!

DOGFORCE: SEASONS is a high-scoring, combo-chaining, secret-hiding dog simulator that challenges you to get as much dog business as possible done in 45 seconds. It features SPRING, SUMMER and WINTER seasons!

Featuring:

  • Six dogs - Labrador, German Shepherd, Pug, Husky and St. Bernard!
  • Costumes! Don't let Husky go out without his hat and scarf, and make sure Bernard puts on his reindeer antlers and red nose before he visits Santa. Or put some Hallowe'en outfits on before you go out trick or treating.
  • Seasonal levels! - Christmas trees, ghosts, carollers and fireworks!
  • A funky and bright soundtrack from Case Portman and bonus ditties if you howl at the choirs! (Hold UP + BARK to howl).

You can find the original jam version of DOGFORCE on itch.io here.

A NOTE FOR LINUX USERS - I don't have a specific Linux build yet, and the current version of DOGFORCE does not reliably run on Wine. I'm working on this! If you have any problems, please let me know and I'll try and resolve them.

Thanks to davilca and be-steele for their sound effects - lazymonk, skyko, esperri, kbnevel and martian also.
